    • Constructor Detail

      • XContentBuilder

        public XContentBuilder(XContent xContent,
                       java.io.OutputStream bos)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a new builder using the provided xcontent and an OutputStream. Make sure to call close() when the builder is done with.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • XContentBuilder

        public XContentBuilder(XContent xContent,
                       java.io.OutputStream bos,
                       java.lang.String[] filters)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a new builder using the provided xcontent, an OutputStream and some filters. The filters are used to filter fields that won't be written to the OutputStream. Make sure to call close() when the builder is done with.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
